content:
You can use the following formula in Excel to convert the Unix epoch time (1673958391 in this case) to a date string with an offset of GMT-5:
```scss
=TEXT((1673958391/86400)+DATE(1970,1,1)-5/24,"MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss AM/PM")
```
This formula will give you the result as `01/17/2023 12:26:31 PM`.
